roleset.name: determine quite detailedly

example.name: pinpoint-v: transitive
example.text: [Osamu Nagayama , deputy president of Chugai , which spends about 15 % of its sales on research and development]-1 , was unable *trace*-1 to pinpoint how much money Chugai would pump into Gen - Probe .
example.arg: how much money Chugai would pump into Gen - Probe

example.name: pin-pointing-n
example.text: The recognition of such a connection helped confirm the seafloor - spreading hypothesis by *PRO* pin - pointing the zones where Hess had predicted oceanic crust is being generated -LRB- along the ridges -RRB- and the zones where oceanic lithosphere sinks back into the mantle -LRB- beneath the trenches -RRB- .
example.arg: the zones where Hess had predicted oceanic crust is being generated -LRB- along the ridges -RRB- and the zones where oceanic lithosphere sinks back into the mantle -LRB- beneath the trenches -RRB-

roleset.note: PINPOINT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'pinpoint' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet or Framenet entry. No comparison. (from pinpoint.01-v predicate notes)
